## encode variable

Compresses input using dynamically sized RLE compression and returns result as `Uint8Array`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
encode: (src: Iterable<number>, num: number, wordSize?: number, rleSizes?: RLESizes) => Uint8Array
```
